review: I suffer from ingrown hairs in my bikini area resulting in painful boils in my bikini, upper thigh and lower buttocks areas. I am severely allergic to the popular amoxicillin in any of its variants. The doctor prescribed tetracycline twice daily. I’d say 3 to 4 days I noticed results, and by day seven all the boils were gone,  Didn’t notice any side effects besides stomach pain as the one time I’d take it without having something on my stomach made me very uncomfortable.
